评论详情: I needed a nuetral bag for a wedding I was attending and didn’t want to spend a lot of money on it as I wouldn’t be using regularly.  This purse fit the bill.  It checked off all the right boxes - color, shine, room and price.  I recommend this purse.

评论概述: The time of delivery was perfect thank you
评论详情: The purse that I got is really beautiful. I love it thank you so much.
So Cute, just as pictured

This is a cute lil purse I bought to go with an outfit for my birthday. It looks slightly different when the sun hits it, but it turned out great. Not too much room on the inside, but enough to pack your phone, keys, a pack of gum, and of course some lipgloss or lipstick. I’d recommend!
Is very small and looks cheap.
I love my bag it goes great with my patten leather shoes.  Signed Happy 😁
Serves my purpose for occasional use.
This purse goes perfectly with my three pair of black patent leather shoes.
Have received a lot of compliments on my handbag. Move style and just the right size for special occasions...or not!

When they say minimalist, they aren't joking! This purse is the size of a Chicklet. You can get your cell phone in it and your driver's license if you don't put it in a wallet. It's too small to fit any other essentials whatsoever.  The quality of the material It's made from is extremely poor, and it's cheaply made. I sent it back. Not worth a dime.
Cute dressy bag with just enough room for essentials.
The bag is perfect color and right size I needed to match a pair pumps. Good quality and very nice.
I love this purse. Looks exactly like the picture. I love the color. Holds a nice amount of things.

So, I was sitting around the house one day and realized that I was outta luck if anyone challenged me to a purse fight.  That could not stand.  I needed an old time, department store patent leather bag because that's how I rolled.  Since those no longer are available without big bucks, I ordered this one. It's okay. Cheap material; the outside material is shiny but you can see the backing material ridges thru to the surface. The strap is long but flimsy and you better deliver a killing strike with the first swing. I am sure it will fall apart just from the centrifugal force.  One more thing for the, "No dear I did not forget your 1000th year birthday." closet.

I was looking for a simple patent leather bag to match my patent sandals. This fills the bill! Nothing extraordinary but lightweight and roomy enough for essentials to carry when out to dinner. It’s not what I really wanted but for a simple, suitable bag, it serves the purpose.
Do with it had an inside pocket for smaller items but the material is pretty great so far - no peeling (yet) - and very stylish.
purse cute and was delivered right AFTER I got home, so I thought I didn't get it.

评论详情: This bag was ok not as excited as I thought I would be. Nice size but zipper very wrinkled up. Not the bright red I thought it would be. I will definitely use this bag but color is off a little. Price was right
It's stylish and light weight it's plan but look so stylish
